mapper.select: SELECT TB_BUY.req_date, TB_PRODUCT.name, TB_PRODUCT.price, TB_STATE.state FROM HanBit_Final.TB_USER, HanBit_Final.TB_BUY, HanBit_Final.TB_PRODUCT, HanBit_Final.TB_STATE WHERE TB_USER.id=TB_BUY.id and TB_BUY.serial_num=TB_PRODUCT.serial_num and TB_BUY.state_num=TB_STATE.state_num and TB_USER.id=#{id}
SELECT id, `name`, post, main_addr, sub_addr, sex, phone, mobile, email, `point`, pm FROM TB_USER, TB_PM where TB_USER.pm_num=TB_PM.pm_num and TB_USER.id=#{id}
